elements.title: Taraxacum mongolicum
elements.contents: ... that Taraxacum mongolicum (pictured) was first mentioned in writing in the Xinxiu bencao as a medicinal plant in 659 AD?

elements.title: Oslo study
elements.contents: ... that the Oslo study withheld treatment from 2,000 patients with syphilis?

elements.title: Keijō nippō
elements.contents: ... that just after the 1945 liberation of Korea, the remnants of the Japanese colonial government used armed guards to prevent Koreans from seizing the printing equipment of the newspaper Keijō nippō?

elements.title: 2023 EFL League One play-off final
elements.contents: ... that Sheffield Wednesday required a "miracle" to qualify for the 2023 EFL League One play-off final?

elements.title: Pope Leo XIV descends from
elements.contents: ... that Pope Leo XIV descends from Creole people of color?

elements.title: Battle of Cynoscephalae
elements.contents: ... that the Theban general Pelopidas set out for the Battle of Cynoscephalae even after his army was disbanded?

elements.title: Hannah Fry
elements.contents: ... that Hannah Fry used mathematics to compare Elizabeth II's Christmas messages with the lyrics of Snoop Dogg?

elements.title: Stray Kids
elements.contents: ... that Stray Kids is the first act to debut at No. 1 on the Billboard 200 with their first six chart entries?

elements.title: an Indiana TV station
elements.contents: ... that an Indiana TV station promised to begin broadcasting New Year's Eve — but only made it in time for Chinese New Year's Eve?
